Text: My download of this file is "secured" and I can't print it.  I am a lifelong subscriber to the Economist and fully paid up.  But I have moved to Morocco where deliveries are 50:50 and 6 weeks late.  Your torrents are my lifeline.  Please post a version I can print.  I registered with PB for the first time just to write this comment.  Thank you so much for this weekly gift.
Thank you very, very much.  Your efforts are really appreciated.  You provide a valuable service that I will use every week.
